qas.question: Are there any circumstances under which a digimon cannot be reborn?

answers.text: if a Digimon's data is completely destroyed, they will die

qas.question: What typically happens when digimon are killed?

answers.text: Any Digimon that receives a fatal wound will dissolve into infinitesimal bits of data
The data then recomposes itself as a Digi-Egg, which will hatch when rubbed gently

qas.question: When was the digimon life cycle first described?
What was introduced during the first Digimon anime?
What happened to a digimon that receives a fatal wound?

answers.text: dissolve into infinitesimal bits of data

qas.question: What happens to a digimon after it dissolves?

answers.text: goes through its life cycle again

qas.question: What happens if a Digimons data is completely destroyed?

plausible_answers.text: if a Digimon's data is completely destroyed

qas.question: Under what conditions must Digimon be reborn?

plausible_answers.text: dissolve into infinitesimal bits of data
